title: Am I allowed to advertise my Youtube account on LoL boards?

replies.body: As long as it's posted in the proper section like miscellaneous, I don't think it should really be an issue.  You can ask the moderators of the boards to be sure through the[ player behavior & moderation](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) boards.  Hope you get your visibility!
